title: The Biggest Moments from Code, the Latest Robinhood Controversy, and the Future of Fitness Apps
summary:
Kara and Scott discuss the biggest moments from the Code conference, including Kara’s Elon interview that sparked a Musk vs. Bezos rumble. Also: the latest with Robinhood, Citadel and #KenGriffinLied, and a big announcement from The Dawg. Plus, a prediction around fitness and health apps.
Keep an eye on the Pivot feed for bonus episodes: full interviews from Code!
Send us your Listener Mail questions, via Yappa, at nymag.com/pivot.
